column1: Uchi////My last review was on 8/2/10--over a year ago.  But just before I permanently gave up on writing reviews because the elite badge perpetually slipped my grasp
column2: I realized that writing reviews on Yelp is not about obtaining the coveted elite badge
column3: it's about sharing your honest opinions about good or bad food
column4: especially when you feel inclined to yelp to the world (pun intended) how incredibly deep and delectably complex the culinary creations at Uchi Houston turned out to be.  If you're lazy
column5: here's the takeaway--Eat. Uchi. Now.  If you're just curious about the food
column6: proceed to the bulleted portion of this review.  For those of you curious about the whole Uchi Houston experience
